abstract: A two-hour installment of “America’s Got Talent” on NBC delivered the largest audience in prime time, 12.5 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: A two-hour installment of “America’s Got Talent” on NBC delivered the largest audience in prime time, 12.5 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A two-hour installment of “America’s Got Talent” on NBC delivered Tuesday night’s largest audience in prime time, 12.5 million viewers from 9 to 11 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. The network led the night’s ratings over all, garnering a respectable 6.3 million viewers at 8 for a repeat of last Wednesday’s episode of the reality show.

headline.main: Tuesday Ratings: Viewers Tune In to ‘Talent’ and ‘Brother’
